actions.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 102-495.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 290.

official_title: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1993 for the Federal Maritime Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Maritime Commission Authorization Act of 1992

summary.text: Federal Maritime Commission Authorization Act of 1992 - Authorizes appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission, including a separate authorization for Commission relocation expenses. Removes provisions of Federal law setting the amount of a bond indemnifying vessel passengers for nonperformance of the transportation.
